Title: Umbraco Storage Providers
Description: Storage Providers is an extension from Umbraco that provides a CDN media provider and can replace the default physical file storage.

RelatedPackages.Description: The Azure Blob Storage provider has an implementation of the Umbraco IFileSystem that connects to an Azure Blob Storage container.
Adds ImageSharp support for storing the image cache to a pre-configured Azure Blob Storage provider.
